solution_line_template: After he walked {grocery_store_miles} miles to the grocery store, he walked one less than two miles to the pet store, adding {pet_store_base}-{pet_store_less}={pet_store_distance} mile to his journey.
To complete his journey, he walked one less than four miles to return home, adding {home_base}-{home_less}={home_distance} miles. to his journey.
